Title: Natsamrat
Writer: Abhijeet Deshpande (dialogue writer), Abhijeet Deshpande (screenwriter), Mahesh Manjrekar (screenwriter), Kiran Yadnyopavit (dialogue writer)
Actors: Nana Patekar, Medha Manjrekar, Mrinmayee Deshpande, Sunil Barve
Plot: After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.
